append.xpath: /items/item[starts-with(@name,'wand') or starts-with(@name,'sword') or starts-with(@name,'polearm') or starts-with(@name,'dagger') or starts-with(@name,'claw') or starts-with(@name,'scythe')]/property[@name='Tags']/@value

set.xpath: /items/item[starts-with(@name,'wand') or starts-with(@name,'sword') or starts-with(@name,'polearm') or starts-with(@name,'dagger') or starts-with(@name,'claw') or starts-with(@name,'scythe')]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='DegradationPerUse']/@tier

/items/item[starts-with(@name,'wand') or starts-with(@name,'sword') or starts-with(@name,'polearm') or starts-with(@name,'dagger') or starts-with(@name,'claw') or starts-with(@name,'scythe')]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='DegradationMax']/@tier

/items/item[starts-with(@name,'wand') or starts-with(@name,'sword') or starts-with(@name,'polearm') or starts-with(@name,'dagger') or starts-with(@name,'claw') or starts-with(@name,'scythe')]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='EntityDamage']/@tier

/items/item[starts-with(@name,'wand') or starts-with(@name,'sword') or starts-with(@name,'polearm') or starts-with(@name,'dagger') or starts-with(@name,'claw') or starts-with(@name,'scythe')]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='BlockDamage']/@tier

/items/item[starts-with(@name,'staff') or starts-with(@name,'wand') or starts-with(@name,'sword') or starts-with(@name,'polearm') or starts-with(@name,'dagger') or starts-with(@name,'claw') or starts-with(@name,'scythe')]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='ModSlots']/@tier

/items/item[starts-with(@name,'staff') or starts-with(@name,'wand') or starts-with(@name,'sword') or starts-with(@name,'polearm') or starts-with(@name,'dagger') or starts-with(@name,'claw') or starts-with(@name,'scythe')]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='ModSlots']/@value
